title: What makes a video go viral?
description: Rob and Neil discuss what makes people want to share a video

vocabItems.definition: a picture or video with an amusing caption that a lot of people share with each other online
goes viralwhen something (e.g. a video or picture) gets passed on very quickly from person to person on the internet
people the same age as ourselves who share the same social position in a group
to excite a particular feeling in somebody
to make someone excited and enthusiastic about something
